abstract: New York City invites residents to submit a name for a parking lot in Queens that is being converted into an oasis of wetlands, plantings and nice benches.
snippet: New York City invites residents to submit a name for a parking lot in Queens that is being converted into an oasis of wetlands, plantings and nice benches.
lead_paragraph: Feeling inspired? New York City is holding a naming contest for a soon-to-be-unveiled green space in Queens.

headline.main: Name That Green Space in Queens
